headline.main: SOVIET OFFENSIVE ADDS TO ITS GAINS; Timoshenko Takes 4 Places in Ukraine as Drive for Nazi Bases Is Pressed ZHUKOFF PARRIES ATTACKS Beats Off Blows Near Smolensk -- Moscow Predicts Freeing of Vitebsk Area Soon

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Thursday, April 2 -- Judging from reports from the Russian front early this morning from both Soviet and German sources, the operations there are continuing to develop on the lines of a general offensive -- initiated by the Red Army.
